skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Transfers all debuffs from this Champion to the target. Heals this Champion by 5% of their MAX HP for each debuff transferred.
skills.name: Sword of the Glades
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. 

Also steals all [Continuous Heal] buffs from each enemy. This effect cannot be resisted.
skills.name: Rust Consume You
skills.books:

Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Places a [Taunt] buff, a 60% [Increase DEF] buff, and a 25% [Strengthen] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
skills.name: Call of the Wild

skills.desc: Whenever an ally loses 10% or more of their MAX HP from a single hit, places a [Shield] buff on that ally for 2 turns equal to 10% of their MAX HP.
skills.name: Knight of Vines [P]
